Options:
A. Best Picture
B. Worst Picture
C. Best Director

Which producers of the movie 'Fantasy Island' (2020) were nominated for Worst Picture at the 2021 Golden Raspberry Awards?
Options:
A. Jason Blum, Marc Toberoff and Jeff Wadlow
B. Steven Spielberg and George Lucas
C. Christopher Nolan and Emma Thomas
D. James Cameron and Jon Landau
Correct Answer: Jason Blum, Marc Toberoff and Jeff Wadlow
